HelpXML.Title: FSMbsb
HelpXML.Purpose: FSMbsb gives the units belonging to subset at step(s) msel of the forward search

Item.Name: Y
Item.LongDesc: n x v data matrix; n observations and v variables. Rows of Y represent observations, and columns represent variables. Missing values (NaN's) and infinite values (Inf's) are allowed, since observations (rows) with missing or infinite values will automatically be excluded from the computations.

Item.Name: bsb
Item.LongDesc: List of units forming the initial subset. If bsb=0 (default) then the procedure starts with p units randomly chosen else if bsb is not 0 the search will start with m0=length(bsb)

Item.Name: init
Item.ShortDesc: Point where to start monitoring required diagnostics
Item.LongDesc: Note that if bsb is supplied, init>=length(bsb). If init is not specified it will be set equal to floor(n*0.6).

Item.Name: bsbsteps
Item.ShortDesc: Save the units forming subsets in selected steps
Item.LongDesc: It specifies for which steps of the fwd search it is necessary to save the units forming subset. If bsbsteps is 0 we store the units forming subset in all steps. The default is store the units forming subset in all steps if n<=5000, else to store the units forming subset at steps init and steps which are multiple of 100. For example, as default, if n=7530 and init=6, units forming subset are stored for m=init, 100, 200, ..., 7500.
Item.Example: 'bsbsteps',[100 200] stores the unis forming subset in steps 100 and 200.

Item.Name: plots
Item.LongDesc: If plots=1, a plot of the monitoring of minMD among the units not belonging to the subset is produced on the screen with 1 per cent, 50 per cent and 99 per cent confidence bands else (default) no plot is produced.

Item.Name: msg
Item.ShortDesc: It controls whether to display or not messages about great interchange on the screen
Item.LongDesc: If msg==1 (default) messages are displyed on the screen else no message is displayed on the screen

Item.Name: nocheck
Item.ShortDesc: It controls whether to perform checks on matrix Y
Item.LongDesc: If nocheck is equal to 1 no check is performed on matrix Y. As default nocheck=0.

Item.Name: Un
Item.LongDesc: (n-init) x 11 Matrix which contains the unit(s) included in the subset at each step of the search. REMARK: in every step the new subset is compared with the old subset. Un contains the unit(s) present in the new subset but not in the old one. Un(1,2) for example contains the unit included in step init+1. Un(end,2) contains the units included in the final step of the search.

Item.Name: BB
Item.TypeInd: Units belonging to subset in each step or selected steps.

References.Item: Atkinson Riani and Cerioli (2004), Exploring multivariate data with the forward search Springer Verlag, New York.

Item.Title: FSMbsb with all default options.
FSMbsb with optional argument.
Monitoring the units belonging to subset in each step.
Specifying the point where to start monitoring.
Item.Desc: Specifying the point where to start monitoring units belongng to subset.
